0.9.name: wordpress/blackpiggy
0.9.description:
BlackPiggy is a wordpress plugin that allow you install into your blog the blackpiggy widget. BlackPiggy offers to small businesses: - the ability to put deals on their websites. - the ability to promote deals with other releated deals of different vendors. - a gamification platform that converts customers into active promoters
